pages.text: Canisters are a simple storage containers for gases used in $(l:multiblocks/accelerators/linear_accelerator#ion_source)accelerator ion sources$(/l) to create particle beams. They are not used up in ion sources and therefore are reusable, being able to be refilled with gas.

Sources are sources of particles emitted by the radioisotope inside them. The have 2 different uses. The radioisotopes that emit strong gamma rays (e.g Co-60, Ir-192) are used in the $(l:blocks_and_machines/irradiator)Irradiator$(/l) to sterilize items. Other isotope sources are used in the accelerator ion source to create particles.
Tungsten filaments are a simple source of electrons in $(l:multiblocks/accelerators/linear_accelerator#ion_source)accelerator ion sources$(/l). They wear out after a while and must be replaced.
